topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Email :: Mail Transport Agents

name: qscanq
short_description: Qscanq scans every email message submitted to qmail before allowing it to be added to qmail's mail queue. Infected emails are rejected, not bounced, so you won't have to deal with double-bounces during virus outbreaks.
